text: ContourGlobal plc is a British power generation business. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index. ==History== The company was established by Joseph Brandt with financial support from Reservoir Capital Group in 2005. In June 2015 it purchased the Vorotan Cascade in Armenia for US$180 million. ContourGlobal was the subject of an initial public offering which raised net proceeds of £281 million in November 2017. It then agreed to acquire Acciona's solar power plants for US$1.19 billion in February 2018. ==Operations== The company generates circa 59% of its power from traditional sources of fuel such as natural gas and coal and circa 41% from renewable sources such as wind, solar and water. It owns and operates 69 power generation plants across 19 countries. ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:Companies established in 2005 Category:Companies listed on the London Stock Exchange
